text: The Biondo Theatre (Italian: Teatro Biondo, complete name Teatro Biondo Stabile) is a theatre of Palermo. It is located in the central Via Roma and represents the more recent historical theatre of the city. The theatre was designed by the communal architect Nicolò Mineo and built between 1899 and 1903. On 15 October 1903 it was inaugurated with a performance of Ermete Novelli. == External links == * Official site Biondo Category:Neoclassical architecture in Palermo
title: Teatro Biondo
